segments.text: I'm really quite struck by the adult's complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, diligently polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on this one small task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the water pooling around her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the sink edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are making off with cookies right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness feels almost willful at this point.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's as if she's intentionally ignoring everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is getting out of hand very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to step in and fix things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find her inaction quite frustrating, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these hazards are just escalating around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's living in her own little bubble, apparently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for accidents is just growing and growing.
segments.speaker: PAR
